SEARCH
Module OOPCAMSFinalcodes
Package controllers

Class StudentHandler

java.lang.Object
controllers.StudentHandler
public class StudentHandler extends Object
This class provides functionalities related to student interactions with camps. It includes handling student registrations, withdrawals, and managing enquiries for camps.

      public static boolean SuccessfulRegistrationHandler(Student s, Camp c)
      Handles successful registration of a student for a camp.
      Parameters:
      s - The student who is registering.
      c - The camp for which the student is registering.
      Returns:
      true if the registration is successful.

      Checks if a student has already registered for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      s - The student to check.
      c - The camp to check against.
      Returns:
      true if the student has already registered for the camp.

    • checkDateClash

      public static boolean checkDateClash(Student s, Camp c)
      Checks for any date clashes with the student's existing registrations and a new camp.
      Parameters:
      s - The student whose schedule is to be checked.
      c - The new camp to check against the student's schedule.
      Returns:
      true if there is a date clash.

      Checks if a student has withdrawn from a camp previously.
      Parameters:
      s - The student to check.
      c - The camp to check against.
      Returns:
      true if the student has previously withdrawn from the camp.
